features.level-0: You gain +1 Move and +1 Defense against Melee Attacks for every 2 Acrobat templates. If you are encumbered or have your Movement impaired, you lose these bonuses.

classes.name: Assassin
classes.startingEquipment: Fraudulent papers; a black mask; and a knife or a pistol with 1 magazine.

features.level-0: You get +2 on all Stealth checks. Attacks you make against unaware targets ignore 2HP for each Assassin template.

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.startingEquipment: an ax, hammer, or farm tool; olive oil, whiskey, light armor

features.level-0: You get +1 HP for each Barbarian template you possess, and a +1 bonus to Attack rolls with an exotic weapon of your choice.
You get a +1 bonus on all Reaction rolls for every 2 Courtier templates you possess.

classes.name: Fighter
classes.startingEquipment: any armor of your choice, any 2 melee or thrown weapons or 1 firearm with 2 magazines; a nasty scar

features.level-0: You get a +2 bonus on all Attack rolls.

classes.name: Hunter
classes.startingEquipment: light armor; a bow and 10 arrows or a rifle and 1 magazine;

features.level-0: You are trained in archery and have a +1 Attack bonus with bows and rifles for every two Hunter templates you possess.

classes.name: Thief
classes.startingEquipment: light armor; a small knife, club or pistol with 1 magazine.

features.level-0: You gain +1 bonus to all checks to Investigate or bypass locks. You also get +1 Stealth for every 2 Thief templates you possess.
You gain +1 magic dice (MD) for every Wizard template you possess.
